== Easy ADSL USB modem configuration ==
<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+spec/usb-adsl-modems|ADSL USB Modems]]</nowiki> ('''<nowiki>[[http://www.linux-usb.org/SpeedTouch/ubuntu/index.html|Neostrada & co.]]</nowiki>''', see UKSpeedtouchDSLHowTo ):
* identify modem (SpeedTouch330 2: KQD6_3.012 + 0: may be mgmt.o - or 4: ZZZL_3.012, Eagle USB)
* get the firmware (Windows partition, net package, CD path: TPSA $CD/Linux/ST330/neostrada_tp.tgz/neostrada_tp/ST330_firmware_3012.zip)
* unpack the right firmware (firmware_extractor)
* load it (modprobe speedtch, ?)
* set provider settings (Netia-Net24 - PPPoE - VPI/VCI: 8/35, TPSA - PPPoA - VPI/VCI: 0/35) and user/passwd
* TPSA: registration first, user/passwd change then
